message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
Hello Alice, thanks for the offer, but that price is a little high for me.  Would you consider a lower price, closer to $60?
I understand you're looking for a better price, Bob. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $100.
I appreciate you coming down a bit, Alice.  How about we try to find a compromise closer to $75?  I think that's a fair price.
I can see you're still a bit off on the price, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair deal. I can offer it to you for $110.

Alice, I understand you have a bottom line, but $110 is still more than I'm looking to spend. If you're willing to come down to $80, I'm ready to buy right now.  Otherwise, I'll need to consider my other options.

I understand you're trying to get the best deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go below $110. I'm willing to throw in some extras to sweeten the deal, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price for the product. I can offer it to you for $105.
